cards.requirements: Veteran Troop, Elite Troop, or Chain of Command
cards.text: At the end of the game, a trooper in a non-Null State whose Troop Classification is Veteran or Elite Troop, or a trooper possessing the Chain of Command Special Skill, must be in base contact with an enemy trooper. The enemy must be in a Null state and be totally inside the enemy's Deployment Zone.

The Hacker must spend one Short Skill of the Order and succeed at one WIP-3 Roll against any enemy model inside his Zone of Control. The target may declare a Reset ARO no matter which Type of Troop it is (LI, MI, HI…) and even if the Data Scan is performed outside his LOF.
To get an allied trooper recovered from Unconscious to Normal state by using the Doctor Special Skill, or by using a MediKit/Medjector.
To perform a Coup de Grâce against an Unconscious or Spawn-Embryo enemy model.

A trooper whose Unit Type is Medium or Heavy Infantry, with the enemy HVT model inside his Zone of Control, must spend a Short Skill and succeed at a WIP Roll. Bonus: If the trooper has LoF to the enemy HVT model the WIP Roll gets a +3 MOD.

cards.requirements: Forward Observer or Spotlight Hacking Program
cards.text: The player must succeed at two Forward Observer Rolls or two Spotlight Hacking Program Rolls against the enemy HVT model. The player is authorized to perform this type of Attack against the HVT model.
A Hacker with the enemy HVT model inside his Zone of Control must spend a Short Skill and succeed at a WIP -3 Roll.

cards.requirements: Biometric Visor, Multispectral Visor or Sensor.
cards.text: A trooper with the Biometric Visor or the Multispectral Visor piece of Equipment with the enemy HVT model inside of his Zone of Control and LoF, or a trooper with the Sensor Special Skill with the enemy HVT model inside his Sensor Area, must spend a Short Skill and succeed at a WIP Roll.
